replies.body: toss up between yas and ahri, if you're counting skins its a different story

> [{quoted}](name=reaperteaser,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=EW8GezAU,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-02-11T12:25:39.636+0000)
>
> toss up between yas and ahri, if you're counting skins its a different story

Ahri is actually not that weeb. Because she's the Korean interpretation of the fox spirit mytho (fox spirits are generally known by their appearances in either Chinese, Japanese or Korean legends).
whats the definition of weeb again?

weeb comes from weeaboo which was a word filter on 4chan for wapanese (wannabe japanese) that originated as a nonsensical word in a perry bible fellowship comic strip.

Basically someone obsessed with Japanese culture.

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/GD6qtc2_AQA/maxresdefault.jpg
Thanks

Well that excludes Yasuo since he **is** Japanese.

> [{quoted}](name=reaperteaser,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=EW8GezAU,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2017-02-11T13:18:25.667+0000)
>
> whats the definition of weeb again?

Along the lines of "unhealthy obsession of Japanese things" or something like that, though nowadays it's used to refer to anyone liking and/or anything remotely Japan.

yasuo defs.


All the little "l3l Jepen" "my samurai"

> [{quoted}](name=SwaT 10,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=EW8GezAU,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-02-11T12:19:23.497+0000)
>
> {{champion:157}}  {{champion:99}}

To those who might be a bit unsure why they put Lux here, it's because Lux by the designer's admission, is a direct homage to Marisa Kirisame from the Touhou Project franchise. Lux also carries various references from quotes to skin ideas pointing to the homage.

.....

That said, the weeb-iest champ has to be Yasuo. Just look at him.
